sentences.en: A sudden howl pierced the silence.
sentences.cn: 突然一声嗥叫划破了寂静.

sentences.en: He gave a howl of pain.
sentences.cn: 他发出一声痛苦的吼叫.

sentences.en: He let out a howl of anguish.
sentences.cn: 他发出一声痛苦的嚎叫。

sentences.en: He makes audiences howl with laughter .
sentences.cn: 他令观众哈哈大笑。

sentences.en: He sprang up with a howl.
sentences.cn: 他嚎叫一声跳了起来.

sentences.en: He that lives with wolves will learn to howl.
sentences.cn: 同恶人生活在一起将学会恶行.

sentences.en: He tossed back his head in a howl of berserk laughter.
sentences.cn: 他仰天狂笑。

sentences.en: It's not polite to howl down a speaker.
sentences.cn: 大喊大叫妨碍别人的讲话是不礼貌的.

sentences.en: Somewhere a dog suddenly howled, baying at the moon.
sentences.cn: 某个地方的一只狗突然嗥叫起来，对着月亮狂吠。

sentences.en: That long, lugubrious howl rose on the night air again!
sentences.cn: 夜空中又传来了那又长又凄凉的狗叫声.

sentences.en: The candidate was howled down at the town meeting.
sentences.cn: 在镇上的集会中，候选人的声音被嘲弄的喧嚷声淹没了

sentences.en: The child set up a howl.
sentences.cn: 这个孩子大哭起来.

sentences.en: The dog let out a savage howl and, wheeling round, flew at him.
sentences.cn: 那只狗发出一声凶猛的狂吠，突然转身向他扑去。

sentences.en: The dogs howled all night.
sentences.cn: 那些狗整夜嘷叫。

sentences.en: The sense of wrongs, the injustices, the oppression, extortion, and pillage of twenty years suddenly and found voice in a raucous howl of execration.
sentences.cn: 二十年来所深受的损害、压迫、勒索、掠夺和不公平的对待，一下子达到了最高峰，在一阵粗声粗气的谩骂叫嚣里发泄出来。

sentences.en: Then a terrific howl of derision silenced him.
sentences.cn: 接着是惊天动地的吼声一片,嘲笑四起,把他镇住了.

sentences.en: to howl in pain
sentences.cn: 疼得直叫喊

sentences.en: Upstairs, one of the twins began to howl (= cry ) .
sentences.cn: 楼上，双胞胎中的一个开始大哭起来。

sentences.en: Upstairs, one of the twins began to howl (= cry )。
sentences.cn: 楼上，双胞胎中的一个开始大哭起来。

sentences.en: When the clown comes into town, the dogs come out to howl.
sentences.cn: 小丑进了城, 狗儿们就要出来狂吠.

sentences.en: wind howling in the trees
sentences.cn: 在林间呼啸的风

sentences.en: With a terrible howl, he leapt forward and threw himself into the water.
sentences.cn: 他狂吼一声，向前猛冲，纵身跳进水中。

sentences.en: You howl your little son.
sentences.cn: 喝住你的小儿子.

words.tran_cn: 咆哮的；极大的；哭哭啼啼的
大声叫喊者；嚎叫的人或动物；滑稽可笑的错误

phrases.tran_cn: 喝住，淹没：以嘲弄的吼叫声淹没或使安静

trans.tran_cn: 嗥叫，嚎哭，<俚>及其可笑的事物
trans.tran_en: a loud cry or shout showing pain, anger, unhappiness etc
if a dog,  wolf  , or other animal howls, it makes a long loud sound

trans.tran_cn: 嗥叫； 呼啸； 吼叫， 哀号
trans.tran_en: if the wind howls, it makes a loud high sound as it blows
to make a long loud cry because you are unhappy, angry, or in pain, or because you are amused or excited
if the wind howls, it makes a loud high sound as it blows

trans.tran_cn: 嚎叫，咆哮，哀嚎，<俚>开心地狂笑，<俚>狂欢
trans.tran_en: to make a long loud cry because you are unhappy, angry, or in pain, or because you are amused or excited
If an animal such as a wolf or a dog howls, it makes a long, loud, crying sound
